definition: to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating

sentences.english: One new monitor is also needed.
sentences.chinese: 還需要一艘新的淺水炮艦。

sentences.english: The government has lately been criticized for its increasing reliance on gunboat diplomacy.
sentences.chinese: 政府近來被批評越來越依靠炮艦外交。

sentences.english: Imperialistic aggressors always use gunboat diplomacy to invade countries.
sentences.chinese: 帝國主義侵略者總是向被侵略國施展他們的炮艦外交。

sentences.english: There is also a deeper logic to China's experiment in gunboat diplomacy.
sentences.chinese: 而且中國的炮艦外交實驗有更深層的邏輯。

sentences.english: This is the beginning of its (gun) boat diplomacy.
sentences.chinese: 這只是中國“炮艦外交”的開始而已。

sentences.english: But the incident itself was not a product of gunboat diplomacy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這一事件卻未必是炮艦外交的產物。

sentences.english: He also said they had been shelled by tanks and navy gunboats.
sentences.chinese: 他還表示他們遭到坦克和海軍炮艦的炮擊。

sentences.english: Before WW1 there were a number of 'gun-boat diplomacy' events.
sentences.chinese: 一戰之前有很多“炮艦外交”事件。
